name: Biston
description:
Play Biston! Cute square characters rage out!
This game is insanely hard but incredibly addictive!

The game is very simple!
- Let's collect coins to defeat enemies!
- Upgrade player’s equipment by using coins and defeat strong enemies!
- Let’s compete for high score with friends!

You can record play movie and share this game around the world.
Let’s share enjoyment of Biston to your friends!
